TestCase.name: testOrderBy
TestCase.Resource: LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], sort2=[$2], dir0=[ASC], dir1=[ASC], dir2=[ASC]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e, f)]]])

Sort(orderBy=[a ASC, b ASC, c ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Table1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d, e, f)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d, e, f])
